description: Here's what you might have missed Wednesday on CNN
title: Quickly catch up on the day's news
title_page: News today: Stacey Abrams, wet markets, stimulus checks - CNN
maintext:
(CNN) Here's what you might have missed Wednesday on CNN:
-- More than 90% of the US population is currently under a stay-at-home or shelter-in-place order. Here's where all 50 states stand on reopening.
-- Stimulus checks will hit the bank accounts of 80 million people by today. Others will have to wait longer before the cash is in hand. Here's how to find out when you will get paid.
-- Prominent scientists have bad news for the White House about coronavirus antibody tests: They aren't all accurate.
-- Fact check: Speaking Tuesday in the Rose Garden, President Trump denied making a comment he did make and criticized the World Health Organization for doing the same thing he once did. These are his claims and the facts around them.
